page.title: 17Trade
page.content: A small shop, selling milk. bread, produce cigarettes and postage stamps, opens daily and Sunday morning. There are a number of small businesses run from their homes, there are two window cleaners. one chimney sweep, four builders, three plumbers, one electrician, one fishmonger, one clock maker, one carpenter. There is a weekly market held on the football ground where traders set up their stalls to sell many items such as food,produce.haberdashery.Once a month there is a car boot sale held on Sunday where car owners arrive with items such as plants cakes toys hand-made or unwanted goods. Daily delivery is available of newspapers,milk.twice daily postal service,weekly delivery of coal,potatoes,eggs,weekly clearance of refuse.Occasional street cleaning.
